channel.title: Abouts on Ellie Marvin
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Ellie Marvin

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently a graduate student at Florida State University working on my MA in Digital Humanities. In May of 2019, I earned my BA from FSU and graduated Summa Cum Laude. I double majored in English and Humanities with a minor in Film Studies. My interests and hobbies include writing, editing, graphic design, art, photography, and film. My most recent experience in graphic design is my internship at The Dali Museum in St.
